cloud.about: Rushabh Vasa is a serial entrepreneur by profession. Rushabh is currently Co-founder and CTO of Agrahyah Technologies and aawaz.com. Agrahyah builds AI enabled Voice tech solutions and Aawaz.com, which is the largest podcast network in Indian languages. Rushabh is listed as Google Developer Expert for Cloud Technology and Mentor for Google for Startups.. Beyond technology, Rushabh believes in building a better tomorrow, he does this by being involved in communities including GBG Mumbai, Rotary Club, Green India and also serves as Director at Ruggedian, a Fitness and Wellness Startup.

cloud.speaker_session: Cloud 101: Every Cloud App Starts Here
Cloud 201: Deploy your Apps to Google Cloud
cloud.about: Shilpa is a Software Engineer presently working in the field of Machine Learning(NLP). She is a Tech Speaker, Google MLCC Facilitator, python mentor at 1 million Women to Tech by Oxford Entreprenurers & presently working as Lead AI Consultant in Edtech. Company, with a toal experience of 5+ years in the Industry. She is organiser of GDG New Delhi & WTM Ambassador as well. She loves community building, Innovation and empowering Women in Tech.

ML.about: My interest towards computer science sparked when I was working on a women's safety application aimed towards the women welfare in India and since then I have been incessantly working on improving my skills. I stumbled upon machine learning then. I have made several open-source contributions in the field of ML and would continue to do so. I have made successful prototypes like autonomous car, alphabet recognition, cancer classification, gesture recognition using learning models. My ambition is to make valuable contribution towards ML community and leave a message of perseverance and tenacity. Currently, I am working as a software engineer at Symantec, India. I am also deeply influenced by literature especially Shakespeare's work. Favorite quote : The evil that men do lives after them; the good is oft interred with their bones Julius Caesar (Act III, Scene II) Favorite equation : x²-x+41=0

ML.about: Savvy loves data and everything around it. She used to be a data scientist and has experience working in various domains. She is currently CEO and Founder of Cofiato, which is a Hardware Intelligence firm. Her second love is community evangelism. She's associated with many technical and networking communities like GDG, GCDC, WTM, Linkedin Local, BNI etc. She is also Women in Data Science Regional Ambassador. She likes innovation, creativity, and coffee

ML.speaker_session: Learn to productionize models though CI/CD design
ML.about: I am Senthil Kumar M. I hail from Madurai, Tamilnadu-India with a great passion for innovating through technology to solve real life problems. I have innovated in fields like wireless network, defence, maternal healthcare, and safety solutions and filed nearly 10 patents for the same.Though I began my career as an engineer in Samsung | Qualcomm Fortune 500 companies, I realised that I am called to be an entrepreneur. I quit my job to found two tech startups, Geomeo and JioVio, in urban infrastructure and healthcare sector respectively

web.about: Driving technology for Products used by Millions of people • 13+ Years of Experience • Organizer @itsAllAboutWeb • @GoogleDevExpert • #Writes at @Medium • #Entrepreneur • #TechEnthusiast • #Speaker

Santosh is a GDE for Angular and loves contributing to Angular and NgRx. He works as a software consultant and writes for indepth.dev and mentors for DotNetTricks. He is also the author of the Ngx-Builders package and part of NestJsAddOns core Team. He is also running Tech Talks with Santosh talk show, where he invites the industry experts to discuss different technologies.

web.speaker_session: 101: Fery Pokemon on Firebase with Angular
web.about: Angular GDE and Microsoft MVP Have more than 5 years of experience in application development. Have knowledge about .NET, SQL Server, Power BI Embedded, Azure, Angular. Co-organiser Indore Technical Community (#ngIndore) & All About Web

web.speaker_desc: Software Engineer , Edfora Infotech Pvt. Ltd.
web.speaker_session: 101: Fery Pokemon on Firebase with Angular
web.about: Enthusiasm to Learn' defines me in a nutshell. Aiming towards a goal and making continuous effort to achieve it is what I believe. I am a girl who puts thinking into each step towards giving back to the community by sharing the knowledge with everyone who is in the quest for it. Working as a Software Engineer, I have keen interest in working on new technologies. Being the facilitator of the #IamRemarkable initiative by Google, I always give my best to motivate people around me. Despite busy schedules, I never miss an opportunity to help, travel and eat.

web.speaker_session: 201: Add FIRE (Fast Integrated Reliable Engaging) to your site with PWA & SEO
web.about: Vrijraj is a front-end developer by profession and a community champion by passion. He is an organizer for GDG Jalandhar and a Google Developers Expert for Firebase and Web Technologies. He has given 50+ talks and workshops for communities over the past 5 years. His areas of expertise are around Web, Firebase, Google Cloud Platform, and UI/UX Design. He is always eager to learn new technologies and develop solutions based on them. He enjoys mentoring people and nurturing communities. Outside work, he is a foodie and enjoys watching YouTube videos.
